name: Welcome to Desert Bluffs
description:
This is a fangame for the podcast "Welcome to Night Vale", a twice monthly podcast that you can listen to for free!

https://www.youtube.com/user/WelcometoNightVale

https://twitter.com/NightValeRadio

It's a short demo and only Kevin is actually in the game, but I might work on this more and add more characters.
